data.name: Need for Drive - Open World Multiplayer Racing
data.detailed_description:
The open-world action in Need for Drive - Open World Multiplayer Racing gives you the freedom to drive your way.

Your rivals will do everything they can to stop you from getting to the top – but in this world, there can only be one WINNER.

Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech, and tons of nitrous. It’s all about you, your friends, and a wild selection of cars. Let’s see what you can do in this new open world!

Game Features:
- Experience the action with mind-blowing graphics
- 13 cars available to buy from those old models like Toyota Supra to the new ones like BMW M4
- Multiplayer mode available to play with your friends
- Increase the performance of your car(more than 20 components that you can stage like engine, suspension, brakes, etc)
- Big open world map
- For thrill seekers there is a DRIFT MODE available for every car

What are you waiting for? Enter in this crazy world RIGHT NOW!!!

data.short_description: Your rivals will do everything they can to stop you from getting to the top – but in this world, there can only be one WINNER. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech, and tons of nitrous.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Hd Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7 or later
  • Processor: Intel 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Need for Drive - Open World Multiplayer Racing
